article: Uncle Bruce has been my most influential role model. I admire him because he has _ me into the person I am today by teaching me about respect and responsibility and that anything _ having takes a lot of hard work. If he says, "I'll pick you up at seven on Thursday," it will _ . Also, Bruce is the kind of person who actually listens to you.
